description: Shimizu-sensei (nicknamed "Lady" by her students) is the class teacher of http://anidb.net/ch9745 [the unnamed protagonist], http://anidb.net/ch9748 [Tamaki Maiko], http://anidb.net/ch19495 [Fujinobe Haruka] and http://anidb.net/ch19493 [Kimura Chika]. She may appear a bit strict but only wants the best for her students. Her endless scoldings of and detention penalties for Maiko appear to have no effect on her problem child though (assuming the girl actually listens to these ticking-offs).
name: Shimizu-sensei
